pages.title: Bloodstone
pages.text: The rather $(l:creating_life/kindlings#effulgent_feather)Effulgent Feathers$() of the $(l:creating_life/kindlings)Kindlings$(/l) are notable, enough so to compel you to regularly give the little bumpkins coat trimmings.$(br2)However, you've noticed that, sadly quite frequently, drops of blood will come along with the feathers. The ichor dries quickly, leaving behind a sparkly, crystalline residue.

pages.title: Refining Bloodstone
pages.text: Set upon the crystallarieum and given a $(bold)$(italic)$(fuck)precarious$() amount of $(item)copper$(), the speck of dragonblood will grow and crystallize into a grand slab of glass, shining in stunning scarlet and bleeding with willful magic!
